alert.note: Alert for North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cass County through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walker, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hackensack around 525 PM CDT. Backus around 535 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
